item.title: Black baby buggy left on pavement, 12th September
item.description:
A black baby buggy is on the pavement outside Our Lady of Lourdes School. It was dumped along the road and has moved along the street. Obviously the pavement is used by children and parents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Limes Avenue, New Southgate, London

item.description:

item.title: Red crosses on multiple roundabouts, 12th September
item.description:
This is graffiti and has been present all week. Although itâ€™s nice to know the far right are present as we know where we stand, it should be removed as it is disconcerting for people and it is a criminal offence.

item.title: Tree branch has broken off and fallen close to cars, 12th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, West Wickham, London
